jd: From: vivek, kpg99 vivek@kpgtech.com Reply to: vivek@kpgtech.com Mention visa and locationLocal to TX(NO H1)Title : Sr. IT Project ManagerDuration: Long termVisa : No h1 Location : Austin, TX HYBRIDJOB DESCRIPTION: Note: Candidates must have experience with the State of Texas. Minimum Mandatory Qualifications:Certification: PMI Agile Certified Practitioner (PMI-ACP) or equivalent certification required.Experience: - At least 10 years of experience as a lead Project Manager for technical implementation projects with a total cost of $10 million or more. At least 12 years of experience in technology assessment and reporting in at least two of the following areas: - Cloud migration, cloud-native architecture, cloud platforms and infrastructure, containerization.- CI/CD (Continuous Integration and Continuous Delivery).- Integrated security and accessibility in software development practices.- Unified Application Services Support delivery.- Agile at Scale SDL concepts.- Data Warehousing.- 15 years of experience managing large Agile software development projects.Communication Skills: Strong written and verbal communication skills, with the ability to facilitate technological discussions with both technical teams and executive audiences. Demonstrated ability to write comprehensive assessments and reports in a way that is easily understandable to non-technical stakeholders.Team Leadership: Proven experience leading and managing large, cross-functional teams, especially in government and large enterprise environments. Preferred Qualifications:Experience working with government agencies and familiarity with government regulations and compliance requirements.Strong understanding of cloud platforms such as AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud, and hands-on experience with cloud migration projects.Proficiency with Agile tools like Jira, Confluence, and other project management software.
